biocontainers.name: khmer
biocontainers.summary: Khmer is a set of command-line tools for working with dna shotgun sequencing data from genomes, transcriptomes, metagenomes, and single cells. khmer can make de novo assemblies faster, and sometimes better. khmer can also identify (and fix) problems with shotgun data.

biotools.summary: khmer is a set of command-line tools for working with DNA shotgun sequencing data from genomes, transcriptomes, metagenomes, and single cells. khmer can make de novo assemblies faster, and sometimes better. khmer can also identify (and fix) problems with shotgun data.

galaxy.summary: In-memory nucleotide sequence k-mer counting, filtering, graph traversal and more
